title: Find Minimum by Attribute in Python
description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `min_by()` function in Python to find the minimum value of a list based on a specific property or attribute of each element in the list.

meta.title: Python | Minimum Value | List Functions
meta.description: Learn how to find the minimum value in a Python list based on a specific property or attribute using the min_by() function.
meta.keywords: Python, Minimum Value, List Functions, min_by

steps.title: Find the Minimum Value of a List Based on a Function
